name: Connoisseur
description: Their best ideas come from their omniscient intuition.

name: Master Students
description: Cheap and enthusiastic workforce, they can save you a lot of work.

name: PhD Students
description: They decided to do a PhD. Now they are working hard.

name: Postdocs
description: These brilliant minds are here only to serve your needs.

name: Research Fellows
description: You pay them a lot. They work a lot.

name: Art Historians
description: They bring their own library along and are able to get a lot of work done.

name: Permanent Staff
description: Somebody who gets a permanent position in a museum has to be good.

name: ICOM Board Members
description: They received their position for a reason...
